document.full_text: taliban insurgents, including at least six suicide bombers, hit government targets in southern afghanistan's kandahar on saturday, triggering gunbattles that killed two people in what the militants said was part of their "spring offensive".
document.title: taliban launch wave of attacks in afghanistan's kandahar
lines_and_colors: taliban insurgents, including at least six suicide bombers, hit government targets in southern afghanistan's kandahar on saturday, triggering gunbattles that killed two people in what the militants said was part of their "spring offensive".
